tool_description: An API to parse a phone number from text and validate it in the United States and Australia.
name: Phone Number Parser
title: Phone Number Parser

api_list.name: Parse & Validate Phone Number
api_list.description: Parses phone number from a text string and returns the formatted number along with the validity of the number.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://phone-number-parser.p.rapidapi.com/phone"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "phone-number-parser.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://phone-number-parser.p.rapidapi.com/phone"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "phone-number-parser.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
